DataElement.preferredName: Stratification Criterion Observation Reuse Template Study Activity Foci Duration ISO21090.PQ.TIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An activity defined at a global library level that identifies pre-treatment factors by which study subjects are segregated to assure balance of these factors before randomization to a study arm or some smaller segment of a study. The decisive factor used to help segregate the study subject into a stratum group. A quantity of time in which the observation result is held to be true. EXAMPLE(S): 2 months is the focalDuration for the question, "Have you smoked in the last 2 months?"

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Stratification Criterion Observation Reuse Template Study Activity Foci Duration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The process of classifying patients into a sequence of grades or ranks as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis.:That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._Area of greatest concentration, attention, or activity; a central point or locus, especially of an infection.:The period of time during which something continues.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The process of classifying patients into a sequence of grades or ranks as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis.:That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: The process of classifying patients into a sequence of grades or ranks as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis.
That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Area of greatest concentration, attention, or activity; a central point or locus, especially of an infection.:The period of time during which something continues.

The period of time during which something continues.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains PQ to have units that describe a period of time.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.
